TableView.name: VIEW_SMP8_PAINEL_ACOMP
TableView.beforeDrop:
CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW "EASYVIEW"."VIEW_SMP8_PAINEL_ACOMP" ("DATA", "SMP8", "CN", "PMM") AS
WITH Dias AS
(SELECT UNIQUE TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'dd') AS Data
FROM CDRVIEW_SMP8 Dt
WHERE TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'dd') >= 1
AND TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'dd') <= 10
),
MesAno AS
(SELECT UNIQUE TO_CHAR(Dt.DATA, 'mm/yyyy') AS Data FROM CDRVIEW_SMP8 Dt
),
Dia_X_Mes_X_Ano AS
(SELECT Concat(Concat(Dias.Data, '/'), Mesano.Data) AS data
FROM Dias Dias,
Mesano Mesano
),
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo as
(select DATA, CENTRAL, CN, PMM, REGIONAL, UF, SMP8_A, SMP8_B from view_msc_vinculo_smp8 where codigo != 'NID'
),
Smps_dados AS
(SELECT Data AS DATA,
TO_CHAR(CN) AS CN,
CASE
WHEN SMP8_B = '0'
AND SMP8_A != '-'
AND TO_NUMBER(SMP8_A) >= 0
THEN '0,00'
WHEN (SMP8_B = '-'
AND SMP8_A = '-')
THEN '-'
WHEN SMP8_B != '0'
AND SMP8_B != '-'
AND SMP8_A = '-'
THEN '0,00'
ELSE NVL(trim(TO_CHAR(ROUND(((SMP8_A / SMP8_B) * 100),2),'999990D99')), '-')
END AS SMP8
FROM
(SELECT TRUNC(Tab.DATA) AS Data,
Tab.CN,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(SMP8_A, 0))), '-') AS SMP8_A,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(SMP8_B, 0))), '-') AS SMP8_B
FROM
view_msc_cn_ativo_smp8 b,
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo Tab
WHERE TO_CHAR(Tab.DATA, 'dd') IN
(SELECT Dias.Data FROM Dias
)
and tab.central = b.msc
and tab.cn = b.cn
and to_date(to_char(tab.data,'MM/yyyy'),'MM/yyyy') = b.periodo
and b.status = 'T'
GROUP BY TRUNC(Tab.DATA),
Tab.CN
)
),
Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm AS
(SELECT to_date(D.data, 'dd/mm/yyyy') AS Data,
Cn.nome
FROM CN Cn,
Dia_X_Mes_X_Ano D
),
Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp AS
(SELECT NVL(TRUNC(Smpdados.DATA), Diascnpmm.Data) AS Data,
NVL(TO_CHAR(Smpdados.SMP8), '-') AS SMP8,
Diascnpmm.nome AS Cn
FROM Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm Diascnpmm,
Smps_Dados Smpdados
WHERE TRUNC(Diascnpmm.Data) = TRUNC(Smpdados.DATA(+))
AND Diascnpmm.nome = Smpdados.CN(+)
)
SELECT TO_CHAR(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Data, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS DATA,
CASE
WHEN (Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.SMP8 != '-'
AND TO_NUMBER(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.SMP8) > 100)
THEN '100,00'
ELSE replace(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.SMP8,'.',',')
END AS SMP8,
TO_CHAR(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Cn) AS CN,
TO_CHAR('PMM') AS PMM
FROM Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp
ORDER BY TO_CHAR(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Cn),
TO_CHAR(Dias_X_Cn_X_Pmm_X_Smp.Data, 'DD/MM/YYYY');
TableView.layoutSQL: Select * From dual
